dmca.title: Contested Art 1996
dmca.body:
As you are no doubt aware, your company is the server of a website
for Maine Antique Digest, upon which site an article appears entitled
"Contested Art 1996" written by David Hewett and published by Maine
Antique Digest.  As such, you are hereby notifited that this article is
replete with distortions, falsehoods and misrepresentations of fact
as it relates to my client, Sabatino Abate of Boston, Massachusetts.

Further, be advised that this article is defamatory in nature and has
held my client up to ridicule in the community.  As server of the
website upon which this defamatory article appears, demand is hereby
made that you CEASE AND DESIST your hosting of this false and malicious
article.  Be advised that in accordance with internet law, hosts of 
defamatory materials who are placed on notice can be held liable for
damages and the statute of limitations relative to republication of
1996 defamatory material on the internet does not apply.  Accordingly,
I strongly suggest that you cease the hosting of this website/article
forthwith.

Should you feel compelled to continue I intend to seek court intervention
and pursue all of my client's legal remedies.

Very Truly Yours

Cirace & Associates

signed: E Richard Cirace

typed from letter: cfm 2003-04-07
